name: Rasetsu Fumaden
description:
This is an action RPG set in the Edo period, in a world where demons, humans, and gods exist together. The player controls Rasetsu Raki, a princess of the demon tribe who possesses great sealing powers and defeats the enemies by skillfully using various 'sword techniques' and 'barrier techniques' that destroy enemies in a wide area.

Tips

Press F1 to change input method
Press alt+s to skip the prologueMore than 20 actions are available to Rasetsu Raki!"Dash" for instantaneous, swift movement
"Bang" that pushes the enemy out of the way to get an upper hand
"Slashing" and "Rebounding" long-range attacks used by the enemy
Also, the normal attacks can be used as consecutive attacks four times in a row.

The sword techniques You can use the "windy longsword" that creates a whirlpool of wind in front of you, knocking back the enemies;
the "groundbreaking slash" that causes the ground to rise and create a wall of rock when you swing your sword;
the "red demon slash" that invokes the power of the demons and buffs you when surrounded by enemies;
the "flaming sword" that creates flames in all directions and delivers multiple hits;
and many other such sword techniques to defeat the enemies.

There's more!!

Actions like the "fiery circle" which creates a huge explosion that engulfs enemies inside the range of the circle;
the "windstorm circle" which creates a tornado above the range of the circle and gathers all enemies in one place;
the "lightning strike" which creates a lightning storm above the range of the circle and continuously damages the enemies;
have an even wider impact than the sword techniques.

You can freely combine the different operations like the normal techniques, the sword techniques, and the barrier techniques to create your own unique fighting style.
